DOC.brief_summary: This open label investigation determine whether cardiopulmonary bypass affect plasma gabapentin concentration preoperative administration set cardiac bypass surgery . Following sign informed consent , 16 patient schedule cardiac bypass surgery give gabapentin ( 600mg , oral ) 1 hour prior surgery , 1 hour follow extubation every 8 hour total 4 dos . Plasma gabapentin level measure prior induction , prior bypass , 10 min bypass procedure , 10 minute separation bypass , 30 minute follow bypass 2 hour follow next 3 dos gabapentin . Pain score , sedation score , side effect morphine equivalent document one day follow surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Gabapentin Concentration During Following Cardiac Bypass
